class_notes: This experiential course, which is part of Philanthropy Lab National Network, introduces students to the role of philanthropy in solving public problems, particularly with regard to inequality in Atlanta.  Students will learn philanthropy by doing as students will make grants totaling $50-$75K to local nonprofits addressing inequality.  Course is hybrid and requires enrolled BBA and MBA students to attend 5 in person, socially distant sessions at Goizueta throughout the semester.  All other sessions will be held online.
course_description: This advanced course explores topics of current interest in organization management.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
